title: Drinkin’ Again (Interlude)
lyrics:
Skit from 2000’s Stankonia.
Guy #1: Man, my woman done left me
Guy #2: Damn
Guy #1: I got laid off
Guy #2: Shit
Guy #1: They say a computer can do my job better then I can damn do it
Guy #2: Motherfuckers
Guy #1: Man, pour me another drink
Guy #2: I feel ya
(Break!)
